channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wet dog fouling on the pavement which is besides a tree that is in front of 95 Fernhead Road., 14th September
item.description:
Wet dog fouling on the that is besides a tree which is in front of 95 Fernhead Road. People get in and out their cars besides this tree and people cross the road besides this tree and children play near this tree. Thank you in anticipation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London

item.title: Doynton/DPH 2nd Arch, 13th September
item.description:
As with the northern arch, the metal chicane has been damaged and removed so electric bikes and mopeds are going through at dangerous speeds rather than dismounting.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-5, Balmore Street, Dartmouth Park, London

item.title: Road Name Plate, 13th September
item.description:
On Ambleside Road at the junction with Heversham Road, Bexleyheath: The white road name plate for Ambleside Road is becoming illegible to pedestrians and drivers as seen in the attached picture. I reported this on here last year with no action taken. Please could the sign be replaced.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Ambleside Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Double yellow lines, 13th September
item.description:
The double yellow lines on lime grove are nearly worn off. It’s encouraging parking over them which is very hazardous. The lines need repainting. The lines on both the corners need to be lengthened as the corners are sharp/ blind and because of the parked cars on both sides drivers are forced to take the corners on the wrong side of the road. There are near collisions every day. Especially when their trees have their over growth at the grass verge. The lines need to be extended so you can approach the corners on the correct side of the road with clear visibility
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26A, Lime Grove, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken branch on Liquidambar styraciflua tree, 13th September
item.description:
A vehicle has broken a branch on a young tree on Neckinger. It needs attention. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Spa Road, Bermondsey, London

item.title: Outside Brookfield primary Chester Road entrance, 13th September
item.description:
The lamppost directly outside the Chester Road Brookfield entrance isn’t working at 9:30 PM in the dark. The rest on the street are on.
